markdownRemark.html:
“Mendicants, these ten things don’t culminate in the removal of greed, hate, and delusion apart from the Holy One’s training. What ten? Right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, right immersion, right knowledge, and right freedom. These are the ten things that don’t culminate in the removal of greed, hate, and delusion apart from the Holy One’s training.”

AN.10.127. Pañcamasutta (“Fifth”)

children.value:
“Mendicants, these ten things don’t culminate in the removal of greed, hate, and delusion apart from the Holy One’s training.
What ten?
Right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, right immersion, right knowledge, and right freedom.
These are the ten things that don’t culminate in the removal of greed, hate, and delusion apart from the Holy One’s training.”
